The $(l)$(o)Chunk Scanner$() is a tool used to collect geographical data on the chunk's vein type. After being scanned, a Miner placed on the same chunk will automagically start mining ores.

pages.title: Peat
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#000000)$(l)Coal Ore$(), it's the smallest and poorest coal vein, which means you'll be getting a lot of stone, dirt and some gravel.

pages.title: Lignite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#000000)$(l)Coal Ore$(), it's the second smallest and poorest coal vein, which means there's still a lot of stone, dirt and gravel here.

pages.title: Bituminous
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#000000)$(l)Coal Ore$(), it's a quite big and rich coal vien, which means you'll find more coal alongside stone, dirt and gravel, but if you're lucky, you might just find some $(#00ffff)$(l)Diamonds$() too.

pages.title: Anthracite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#000000)$(l)Coal Ore$(), it's a the biggest and richest coal vein, which means there's a lot of coal, alongside stone, dirt, gravel and some $(#00ffff)$(l)Diamonds$() too.

pages.title: Siderite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#666666)$(l)Iron Ore$(), it's the smallest and poorest iron vein, with lots of stone, dirt, and some gravel.

pages.title: Limonite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#666666)$(l)Iron Ore$(), it's the second smallest and poorest iron vein, with lots of of stone, dirt and gravel here.

pages.title: Hematite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#666666)$(l)Iron Ore$(), it's a quite big and rich iron vein, with lots of iron alongside stone, dirt and some gravel.

pages.title: Magnetite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#666666)$(l)Iron Ore$(), it's the biggest and richest iron vein, with lots of iron, alongside stone, dirt and some gravel.

pages.title: Chalcopryte
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#FFA500)$(l)Copper Ore$() and $(#666666)$(l)Iron Ore$(), it's the quite rich and very variable vein, with lots of $(#FFA500)$(l)copper$() and $(#666666)$(l)iron$() ores alongside stone, dirt and gravel.

pages.title: Cuprite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#FFA500)$(l)Copper Ore$(), it's the only vein that contains only copper, it's not very rich and very variable in size.

pages.title: Cassiterite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#999999)$(l)Tin Ore$(), it's the only vein that contains only copper, it's not very rich and very variable in size.

pages.title: Stannite
pages.text: Mainly composed by $(#999999)$(l)Tin Ore$(), $(#FFA500)$(l)Copper Ore$() and $(#666666)$(l)Iron Ore$(), with lots of tin, alongside $(#666666)$(l)iron$(), $(#FFA500)$(l)copper$(), stone, dirt and gravel.

pages.title: Cavalerite
pages.text: $(l)Overworld$()$(br)Mainly composed by $(#FFD700)$(l)Gold Ore$(), it's a small and quite rich gold vein$(br2)$(#ff0000)$(l)Nether$()$(br)It's a quite large and rich $(#FFD700)$(l)Nether Gold Ore$() vein, with lots of netherrack, soulsand, gravel, and if you're very lucky some $(l)$(#000000)Ancient Debris$() too!

pages.title: Quartz
pages.text: $(#ff0000)$(l)Nether$()$(br)It's a quite large and rich $(#dddddd)$(l)Quartz$() vein, with lots of netherrack, soulsand and gravel.
